title: Pixie Lott cosies up to fiancé Oliver Cheshire at the star-studded WellChild awards in London
text:
They are set to marry in 2020 after he romantically proposed by St. Paul's Cathedral in 2016.

And Pixie Lott and her fiancé Oliver Cheshire looked more loved-up than ever as they cosied up on the red carpet at the star-studded WellChild awards held at the Royal Lancaster Hotel in London on Tuesday night.

The Baby hitmaker, 28, and model, 31, joined the likes of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, at the annual event which celebrates the inspiring qualities of some of the country’s seriously ill young people.

Smitten: Pixie Lott and her fiancé Oliver Cheshire looked more loved-up than ever as they cosied up on the red carpet at the star-studded WellChild awards held at the Royal Lancaster Hotel in London on Tuesday night

Pixie oozed Hollywood glamour in a red sequinned bardot midi dress, which showcased her toned figure.

The Voice Kids UK judge teamed her ensemble with a pair of black slip-on heels and diamond stud earrings.

Sticking to her Hollywood glamour theme, Pixie styled her signature platinum blonde locks into a curly blow-dried hairdo swept to one side, she added a slick of make-up which included a bold red lipstick to match her dress.

Meanwhile, Pixie's fiancé Oliver looked dapper in a grey suit with a crisp white shirt and taupe coloured tie.

Wow:The Baby hitmaker, 28, oozed Hollywood glamour in a red sequinned bardot midi dress, which showcased her toned figure

Star-studded: The couple joined the likes of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, at the annual event which celebrates the inspiring qualities of some of the country’s seriously ill young people

The couple, who have been dating since 2010, looked loved-up as they cosied up on the red carpet ahead of their 2020 wedding.

The WellChild Awards celebrates the inspiring qualities of some of the country’s seriously ill young people and the dedication of those who go the extra mile to keep children healthy and happy.

Other attendees on the red carpet included Rochelle and Marvin Humes, Harry Potter star James Phelps and Dr Ranj Singh.

Power couple: Other attendees on the red carpet included Rochelle and Marvin Humes who both looked stylish for the celebration

Attendees: Harry Potter star James Phelps, left, and Dr Ranj Singh, right, were also in attendance

Only recently, Pixie revealed to MailOnline that she plans to try and squeeze in six hen dos as she talked wedding plans and trying to make it in America following her first public performance stateside.

The Cry My Heart Out hitmaker, who previously noted that she has 18 bridesmaids following her down the aisle, also admitted that it has been a bit 'hectic' trying to plan her wedding to her model fiancé.

Speaking at a pop-up Coca-Cola photo booth in London's Covent Garden, Pixie gave insights into her upcoming wedding and revealed how she first asked her pals and family to be apart of her big day.

Loved-up: Only recently, Pixie revealed to MailOnline that she plans to try and squeeze in six hen dos as she talked wedding plans with Oliver ahead of their 2020 nuptials (pictured in June)

She said: 'We did a whole shebang and I made little parcels, which is how they all found out, but we’ve done one hen do so far but I did say we were going to have six, so I need to try and fit that in before the wedding.'

Pixie's 'lovely' entourage will include her best friends from school, cousins and family friends, who she said she is desperate to find the perfect dress for.

Detailing her stress over finding the right gown, she said: 'I just want to make sure I get a dress that they’re all happy with because they’re all different shapes and sizes and I want them to all wear the same thing - apart from the little flower girls.'
